comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
AIDS notes.
If the election was stolen, and Jan 6 was like a tourist visit and youre such a perfect leader why would you care? Is there an evil intention youre not wanting us to see?
And he’s innocent??  Let it be seen to prove it.
That’s something an innocent person would want, right?  /s
Sounds like the actions of a guilty person.

Dear Trump, 

Fuck you, you toxic piece of shit. 

Sincerely,

Everyone with an IQ bigger than their shoe size
What he wants and what we all need are two completely different things !

Don’t lose sight of the fact that this arseface is an INCREDIBLY litigious jackass. He will tie anything and everything in the courts for as long as possible. And why not, it’s not like he pays the lawyers anyway.

I don’t necessarily think the worst of the evidence is there...maybe, maybe not, but it’s a great headline that also obscures the fact that Trump wants to drag this (and everything else that doesn’t favor him) out indefinitely.
I read the top bit “Wants call logs, aide’s notes” first and for a split second thought that doesn’t really sound like Trump, then saw “hidden” and was like oh ok, makes sense.
He’s so stupid, he’s telling you where to look.

Once inside the hotel dreary, while I lusted over the  weak and weary,
Over many a fetish and curious acts of which I wanted more-
    While I nodded, nearly fapping, suddenly there came a tapping,
As of some hookers came gently rapping, rapping at my chamber door.
“’Tis some visitor,” I muttered, “tapping at my chamber door—
            Only this and nothing more.”
Why would he want to hide those? /s
Of course he does.
Surely the actions of an innocent man....
I’m gonna say no dog. But thanks for the help!
This is exactly how innocent people behave.  /s

"Don't go looking for evidence against me in these places!"

Thanks for the tip Donald.

This is public property.  Those phones and computers belong to the taxpayers.

Despite what Republicans want you to believe, Donald Trump doesn't own the presidency.

The call logs should be public information after the President leaves office all the time, same with visitor logs. That information is a clear check and balance. 

Notes and transcripts, sure they should be held as privileged unless they are subpoenaed for an investigation. 

Transparency should always be the default position.
Well, I wanted a blow job and some fresh donuts when I woke up this morning and that didn’t happen either.
Might as well scream, "I'm guilty!".
No doubt he has good treason.
How about go fuck yourself
Totally something an innocent person wants
Make them public

You *LOST!* 

Elections have consequences.
That doesn't seem suspicious. I'd just take him at his word and ignore the smoke coming from the room he said isn't on fire.
Guilty
What I really want to see is his speech drafts and how much doodling is on them.
It’s like the telltale heart with him. He just can’t stop himself.
Nixon: "You can't have the tapes".

Hey, Donnie! We’re trying to make America great again here, by exposing the swamp creatures, so STFU!
That said, smart money says “Biden” holds back the truly smoking gun.
It's like he's telling them where to look. Lol.
Spoken like an innocent man…
He can want that as much as he likes, he has no say in the matter.  Good way to avoid getting caught is to never do any misdeeds in the first place.  Such a dumb, dumb little boy.
